name: Moon is Shot
description:
Fight a type 4 civilization for no apparent reason. 

Its one hell of a fight. Go on download it. (btw sound doesn't propagate in empty space so no sound effects for shots :P)

This game was made for a game jam.

Feel free to criticize :)

Controls: WASD to move in 2D and 3D.

                       Left Click To Orient in 3D.

                       Space to shoot.

                       Left Shift to boost.

This game was made in less than 24 hours of work. Hopefully you will be able to get through it.
